ygData.subject: Hiya
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi I m a 20 wood elf bard (Mokas Stardust) on Solusek Ro... my brother is a 32 high elf paladin (Dive Sufferhead)... today was so bad because we couldn t get
ygData.messageBody:
Hi I'm a 20 wood elf bard (Mokas Stardust) on
Solusek Ro... my brother is a 32 high elf paladin (Dive
Sufferhead)... today was so bad because we couldn't get logged
on (due to patch or whatever) and it was truly a sad
sight as we were both DEVASTATED.. that's when I
started thinking "god we are WAY too obsessed!" but, you
know... I gotta level dammit!!!<br>hehe anyway so I still
can't get on so I decided to go joining this club
instead of playing EQ.. hopefully soon I will get to go
back on... hehe...<br>anyway how do you do? this is my
introduction..."allow me to introduce... myself"<br>~Mokas
